title: Careers
html:
Home » About Us » Careers

Be part of something

BIGGER.

Faith + career.

You can make a difference in your work. We mean that, and our customers experience it. Our office ecosystem is at the intersection of ministry and expertise. At AGFinancial, it’s our desire to honor Jesus by doing great work, and by treating others well.

What you do here truly matters.

Just a few reasons you’ll love working here…

Paid Time Off (PTO)

Service-based, and earns up to 120 hours per year.

Mortgage program

Special loan financing rates for full-time employees.

Bonuses

Potential annual bonus plan.

Insurance

Medical, dental, vision, supplemental, and more.

Holidays

14 paid holidays per year.

Retirement

403(b) plan with options, and 8% company contribution (when eligible).

Students

Student loan and tuition assistance programs available.

Perks

Onsite fitness center, complimentary coffee, espresso, and tea, and more…

Ready when you are.

See all open positions below and apply online.

Accounting Clerk

The Accounting Clerk will perform a variety of retirement plan accounting tasks including processing distributions and retirement loans. The desired candidate will be skilled in maintaining accurate records and preparing reports, while providing exceptional support to both clients and internal teams.

This position is responsible to and reports directly to the Retirement Accounting Manager.

Apply Online

Maintenance Expert

The Accounting Clerk will perform a variety of retirement plan accounting tasks including processing distributions and retirement loans. The desired candidate will be skilled in maintaining accurate records and preparing reports, while providing exceptional support to both clients and internal teams.

This position is responsible to and reports directly to the Retirement Accounting Manager.

Apply Online

Your work matters.

As part of our team, you’ll make a difference every single day.

See how we’re helping

AGFinancial (AGF) is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. AGF considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, ancestry, national origin, citizenship, age, sex, marital status, parental status, disability, military or veteran status of an otherwise qualified individual. In addition to being a 501(c)3 tax-exempt corporation, AGF is a faith-based religious organization. As a faith-based religious organization pursuant to the Civil Rights Act of 1964 (42 U.S.C. @2000e-1), AGF hires candidates who agree and attest to our Standards of Conduct.
